title: Crashes Out of Nowhere??
body: Sometimes i'll play a ranked games with some friends and try to climb up to an higher league and elo. Well When the lobby is on the way to get into a game, my league crashes and my files are corrupted???? I've lost 2 ranked games due to my team having to remake

replies.body:
If your files are continuously becoming corrupted and needing repair, it's likely that a full clean reinstallation of League may be necessary. 

You can complete this by running our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and checking the boxes for both *Reinstall* and *Clean Uninstall*. After the process finished, launch the game to finish the patching process.

Let me know if you have any questions.
